channel.title: New project GamesPking PvP server V3
channel.description:
This is a 317 source using Demise's Edgeville Pking Base and the Hell-Pkz V1 Source.
Credits to Demise,Kyuto and Creator of Hell-Pkz V1!
Features: -100% Veng and Veng other with proper emotes and GFX -100% Defender block emotes -100% Bolt GFX and C'bow animation -Spirit Shields added -PvP Armors added - Statius and Vesta - -In-Game Hiscores based on PkPoints -Equipment Screen Interface -525 Dragon Claw Spec -Range Following -Mage Following -Multi Barrage Works -Anti-SYI 100% -Anti-Null 100% -508 Character Models -Yell Ranking system -Economy Based - Monsters drop the good items, or they are in PvP point shop and not too cheap. - -New Textures for client -New Bank -New staff crowns -KBD and KQ heads teleport you to proper lairs by talking to them. -Also Teleports in spellbooks - -Dagg lair drops DFS, Clues, and trimmed armors -Anti-Dupes -Rune Knives added -Barrage freezes properly -Level up interfaces -Pkers must have more than 3 items to Pk -More I can't remember :P
Pictures: [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home3.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home4.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home7.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home8.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Home10.jpg[/img]
Thanks and Enjoy!

item.title: New project GamesPking PvP server V3
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:10, topic:330370”][quote author=watch n lern link=topic=426752.msg3137268#msg3137268 date=1267135681]

That is no where near 100% Dclaws, half of that stuff isn’t 100%.

rofl? its exactly how runescape has it…
[/quote]I doubt it includes the formula.

This server will suck. It has nothing special or unique and just uses client-sided tutorials. It won’t be fun and it sounds like a plain server made for money. You can try to deny it but you know it’s all true.[/quote]
first of all i was talking about the emotes not the attack formula. and second i dont code servers for money i code them because im bored. thanks for telling me what i think though…

marcbob:

this is good except most work was from demise and all you did was add items into pvp shop. Anyway not bad

and i have done a hell of alot more than change items in pvp shop kid. I added all the pvp armors models ints etc. and i looked all of the real runescape bonuses for them and added them. as well as with dclaws and other items. I also deleted the old bank and added the new one. i alos used the hell-pkz source so i moved the home to edgy for more convenience. I also added and edited specials to a few weapons. I also added the monster heads to go to the appropriate places. I also added the level up skill interfaces and more… so dont tell me its demises with more items in pvp shop.

Read full topic

item.title: New project GamesPking PvP server V3
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

This is a 317 source using Demise’s Edgeville Pking Base and the Hell-Pkz V1 Source.

Credits to Demise,Kyuto and Creator of Hell-Pkz V1!

Features:
-100% Veng and Veng other with proper emotes and GFX
-100% Defender block emotes
-100% Bolt GFX and C’bow animation
-Spirit Shields added
-PvP Armors added - Statius and Vesta -
-In-Game Hiscores based on PkPoints
-Equipment Screen Interface
-525 Dragon Claw Spec
-Range Following
-Mage Following
-Multi Barrage Works
-Anti-SYI 100%
-Anti-Null 100%
-508 Character Models
-Yell Ranking system
-Economy Based - Monsters drop the good items, or they are in PvP point shop and not too cheap. -
-New Textures for client
-New Bank
-New staff crowns
-KBD and KQ heads teleport you to proper lairs by talking to them. -Also Teleports in spellbooks -
-Dagg lair drops DFS, Clues, and trimmed armors
-Anti-Dupes
-Rune Knives added
-Barrage freezes properly
-Level up interfaces
-Pkers must have more than 3 items to Pk
-More I can’t remember

Pictures:









Thanks and Enjoy!

Read full topic
